title: Senior DevOps Engineer
education: Landmark University, Nigeria. B.Sc. Accounting Oct 2011 - July 2015
profile_summary: Well-rounded IT professional with ~8 years of experience across tier 1-3 support, cloud services, environment architecting, deployment and monitoring. 5+ years hands-on AWS experience, experienced in designing and operating infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, Pulumi, CloudFormation), containerization (Docker, ECS, AKS), CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Azure DevOps, GitLab CI), and observability (Datadog, CloudWatch). Strong background in cloud security (WAF, GuardDuty, IAM) and database administration (Postgres, MySQL).

projects_experience.project_title: Datadog APM and Infrastructure Monitoring Implementation
projects_experience.overview: Implemented Datadog APM and infrastructure monitoring to visualize performance metrics, configure alerts, and reduce MTTR across services.
responsibilities: Designed and deployed Datadog dashboards and alerts for applications and infrastructure.
Integrated Datadog APM for microservices to track performance and latency.
Configured infrastructure monitoring and automated alerts to reduce mean time to recovery by 40%.
Collaborated with Cloud Ops and development teams to tune monitoring and incident response.

projects_experience.project_title: Continuous Delivery Framework and CI/CD Pipelines
projects_experience.overview: Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines and continuous delivery frameworks to automate build, test and deployment processes for multiple applications.
responsibilities: Implemented Continuous Delivery using Jenkins, Ansible, Maven and Nexus in Linux environments.
Built pipelines in AWS to deploy applications and integrated CI/CD across GitLab/GitHub/Azure DevOps.
Implemented gated approvals, artifact promotion and automated rollback strategies in Azure DevOps YAML pipelines.

projects_experience.overview: Automated provisioning and deployment of staging and production cloud infrastructure using IaC and deployed containerized workloads to managed Kubernetes and ECS.
projects_experience.duration: September 2015 – August 2025 (across Access Bank and Accenture roles)
responsibilities: Developed and managed Terraform modules and CloudFormation templates for repeatable deployments.
Used Pulumi (TypeScript) to define and deploy cloud infrastructure across Azure and AWS.
Created Docker images and managed Kubernetes/AKS/ECS deployments using Helm charts and Kustomize.
Provisioned hybrid Kubernetes clusters and managed storage, logging and monitoring integrations.
